title: Database and File Storage Status
content:
From SmartWiki
 Jump to: 
navigation
, 
search
This section of the 
Global Settings
 page is available form the System tab. 
There is a link to the "Storage Summary" page, which displays the current number of:
Branches (
internal
), 
Accounts (
external
), 
Users
 (
internal
) and Contacts (
external
), 
Tracking Application
 records, 
transaction
 records; and 
deleted records 
in this 
instance
 of 
SmartSimple
. 
The "Total Storage Size" used by the 
instance
 will refresh when the 
Calculate Total Storage
 button is clicked.
A display of the current 
Spool Folder ID
 is also displayed on this page.
See Also
 
What is the Spool Folder Setting in the Global Settings?
 
Global Settings

https://wiki.smartsimple.com/index.php?title=Database_and_File_Storage_Status&oldid=30126
